name.ja: <ruby>超<rt>ちょう</rt></ruby><ruby>重<rt>じゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>武<rt>む</rt></ruby><ruby>者<rt>しゃ</rt></ruby>バイ－<ruby>Q<rt>ク</rt></ruby>

text.en: If you have no Spells/Traps in your GY: You can discard this card; add 1 "Superheavy Samurai" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Superheavy Samurai Bike". You can only use this effect of "Superheavy Samurai Bike" once per turn. Once per turn: You can target 1 Machine monster you control; increase its Level by 2.
